attributes.action: Allow Chris to come to the UK. He has served the consequences for 2009.
attributes.background: Chris Brown has been banned since 2009 from entering the UK, him and his fans want his ban lifted as he then cannot perform any concerts here. He isn't a 'threat' to the public and since 2009 his reason of ban has been sorted and he has had a child. He has a right to come to the U.K.
